text: David John Shearer (born 16 October 1958) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played as a forward. Shearer began his professional football career at his local club, Clachnacuddin in the Scottish Highland Football League. His other professional clubs, all in the English Football League, included Middlesbrough, Scunthorpe United and Gillingham. He made over 230 Football League appearances. He is the older brother of fellow former professional and Highland Football League player Duncan Shearer. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:AFC Bournemouth players Category:Darlington F.C. players Category:Association football forwards Category:Gillingham F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Middlesbrough F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Inverness Category:Scottish footballers Category:Scunthorpe United F.C. players Category:Wigan Athletic F.C. players Category:Billingham Synthonia F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Clachnacuddin F.C. players Category:Highland Football League players
title: Dave Shearer
